One of the best games ever, I would only whish for more care from Valve so the game gets higher tick servers as default and a lot of improvements against cheaters, toxic people and smurf accounts. If you found some people to play with, the quality improves a lot, but you always face players that just one tap you or know where you are and therefore loose and loose and loose. No chance to improve except you use services like faceit where you have not that much cheaters and smurfs.

O melhor jogo em equipe  of all time.

Almost perfect game plagued by toxic community and cheaters.

Cheating is the biggest problem and it looks like valve doesn't care or is incapable of taking more drastic measures (like banning hardware ids or implementing a proper/intrusive anticheat). You will find both new and old accounts with or without countless expensive skins playing super sus. Then you watch replays and report suspects. And then... nothing happens. What?
Since around May 15th only ~5% of people I reported got banned. Before then it was ~50%. So yeah, it's getting worse.

Also, matchmaking is broken. I love playing against players 5+ ranks above my rank. Especially if they are in a 4 or 5 premade group. Thanks valve.

I would LOVE to exclude certain regions from matchmaking. I can do this in Dota2 so why not in CS:GO? Oh yeah, dwindling matchmaking player base. Got it.

Just play this game on Faceit.
